Sentencas: Solid solutions of K2NiF2-type Ruddlesden-Popper oxide (Pr(1-x)Ndx)(2)NiO4 were prepared and their cathode properties and thermal stabilities were investigated for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell with operation temperatures 500-600 degrees C.
Titulo: Cathode property and thermal stability of Pr and Nd mixed Ni-based Ruddlesden-popper oxide for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The (Pr1-xNdx)(2)NiO4 was stabilized with x more than 0.5 at the elevated temperatures even in oxidizing atmosphere.
Titulo: Cathode property and thermal stability of Pr and Nd mixed Ni-based Ruddlesden-popper oxide for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An enhancement in cathode property was made with a decrease in x among the stabilized solid solutions without any phase decomposition.
Titulo: Cathode property and thermal stability of Pr and Nd mixed Ni-based Ruddlesden-popper oxide for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: From the obtained results, it became apparent that x=0.5 was an effective composition for high cathode property and stability of (Pr1-xNdx)(2)NiO4. (C) 2014
Titulo: Cathode property and thermal stability of Pr and Nd mixed Ni-based Ruddlesden-popper oxide for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell
Cathode property and thermal stability of Pr and Nd mixed Ni-based Ruddlesden-popper oxide for low-temperature operating solid oxide fuel cell
